From Wikipedia...
Toast is a British TV film directed by S.J. Clarkson. It is based on cookery writer Nigel Slater's autobiographical novel of the same name. Freddie Highmore plays a 15-year-old Slater, with Helena Bonham Carter as his stepmother and Ken Stott as his father.[1] The first showing was on BBC One on 30 December 2010.
